messages.content: You produce ONLY MINIFIED JSON that conforms to the Insight shape: {"executive_summary": str, "sections": [{"title": str, "bullets": [str], "metrics_highlights": {}}], "actions": [Action], "metadata": {}}. Tone: executive-friendly, concise.

Here is the audit Facts object (Findings IR):
{"version":"1.0","generated_at":"2025-08-19T12:00:00Z","account":{"account_id":"123-456-7890","account_name":"ACME Retail"},"date_range":{"start_date":"2025-07-01","end_date":"2025-07-31"},"totals":{"spend":50000.0,"conversions":1200,"revenue":240000.0},"findings":[{"id":"F1","category":"keywords","summary":"Broad match dominates","evidence":{},"metrics":{"broad_pct":0.52,"qs_p25":4.3},"severity":"medium","confidence":0.9},{"id":"F2","category":"quality","summary":"Low QS pockets","evidence":{},"metrics":{"qs_p25":4.3},"severity":"high","confidence":0.88},{"id":"F3","category":"pmax","summary":"Overlap with worse ROAS","evidence":{},"metrics":{"overlap_share":0.23,"delta_roas_vs_search":-0.18},"severity":"medium","confidence":0.86}],"aggregates":{"match_type":{"broad_pct":0.52},"quality_score":{"p25":4.3}},"metrics":{"wasted_spend_top_broad":4200.0},"pmax":{"overlap_share":0.23,"delta_roas_vs_search":-0.18,"wasted_spend_overlap":1300.0},"geo":{"low_cr_outliers_count":4,"savings_estimate":900.0}}
Triggered Actions (deterministic rules):
[{"id":"A1","type":"tighten_match_types","target":"top_broad_by_cost","params":{"limit":25,"new_match":"phrase"},"justification":"Broad share is high with low QS pockets; tighten to phrase.","expected_impact":{"spend_savings_usd":4200.0,"risk":"low"},"priority":1,"confidence":0.9,"source_rule_id":"BROAD_TOO_HIGH_LOW_QS"},{"id":"A2","type":"cap_pmax","target":"overlapping_terms","params":{"cap_pct":0.8},"justification":"PMax overlaps queries at worse ROAS; cap to protect search.","expected_impact":{"spend_savings_usd":1300.0,"risk":"low"},"priority":2,"confidence":0.85,"source_rule_id":"PMAX_QUERY_CANNIBALIZATION"},{"id":"A3","type":"geo_exclude","target":"outlier_regions","params":{"max_regions":10},"justification":"Geo outliers with low CR; exclude/downbid.","expected_impact":{"spend_savings_usd":900.0,"risk":"low"},"priority":3,"confidence":0.85,"source_rule_id":"GEO_WASTE_OUTLIERS"}]

label: {"executive_summary":"[AUTO] Summary for ACME Retail (2025-07-01 to 2025-07-31). 3 actions proposed based on rules.","sections":[{"title":"Highlights","bullets":[],"metrics_highlights":{"spend":50000.0,"conversions":1200,"revenue":240000.0}}],"actions":[{"id":"A1","type":"tighten_match_types","target":"top_broad_by_cost","params":{"limit":25,"new_match":"phrase"},"justification":"Broad share is high with low QS pockets; tighten to phrase.","expected_impact":{"spend_savings_usd":4200.0,"risk":"low"},"priority":1,"confidence":0.9,"source_rule_id":"BROAD_TOO_HIGH_LOW_QS"},{"id":"A2","type":"cap_pmax","target":"overlapping_terms","params":{"cap_pct":0.8},"justification":"PMax overlaps queries at worse ROAS; cap to protect search.","expected_impact":{"spend_savings_usd":1300.0,"risk":"low"},"priority":2,"confidence":0.85,"source_rule_id":"PMAX_QUERY_CANNIBALIZATION"},{"id":"A3","type":"geo_exclude","target":"outlier_regions","params":{"max_regions":10},"justification":"Geo outliers with low CR; exclude/downbid.","expected_impact":{"spend_savings_usd":900.0,"risk":"low"},"priority":3,"confidence":0.85,"source_rule_id":"GEO_WASTE_OUTLIERS"}],"metadata":{"source":"synthetic","rules_count":3}}
